creator: dbrosius@apache.org
text:
Directory scanner uses a Hashtable internally to a method without allowing it 
to escape. In this case, the synchronization supplied with Hashtable provides 
nothing, and slows down checking of the include patterns. converted to 
HashMap. Also use the right collection iterator (entrySet), to remove needless 
calls to map.get.

Created attachment 18703
remove needless synching in checkIncludePatterns
creator: dbrosius@apache.org
